fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- At least one Civilization Economic will always spawn.
- Factional kill, which each role has a unique death message when using
- Factional chat
- Members can generate gold, which is shared between all members and can be spent by any of them to use abilities. Abilities that cost gold consume that gold immediately upon activation. The faction starts with 5 gold. If no Civilization Economic is alive, the faction generates 1 gold each night.
- If only one Civilization is alive, they may perform the factional kill alongside any other normal abilities.
- A maximum of two people can be converted. If all Civilizations die, the conversions will be reversed.
